TopicTitle: is Quantum Struts ever making a come back??

Articles.Content:
I loved Quantum struts, they allowed for true hard docking when you put stuff together plus they made stations glow with some neat blue lines.

has anyone heard anything from the mod developer or has he/she passed them onto someone else?

If you looked through the Add-on Releases subforums, you would have found that Quantum Struts is now being maintained by toadicus:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/93818-0-24-2-QuantumStrutsContinued-1-1-Magical-Struts-for-Rigidifying-Outside-the-VAB!
Sorry, it was confusing since I didn't see it on the curse website, but I'm noticing this Kerbal stuff site is another place I should check when looking for a mod??

Sorry, it was confusing since I didn't see it on the curse website, but I'm noticing this Kerbal stuff site is another place I should check when looking for a mod??

The forums is the best place to look for mod updates, regardless of whether they are hosted on CurseForge, GitHub, MediaFire, Dropbox, or any other site.
